transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, am I speaking as Abby here? Abby Fraser.
Speaker B: What?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Abby here?
Speaker B: Speaking.
Speaker A: Yeah, Abby, we should rish up this side. Calling you from Amber Student. This call was regarding your student accommodation for University College London.
Speaker B: Yes, I.
Speaker A: Can see that you have shortlisted for Britannia Arlington Residents. Correct.
Speaker B: As what side?
Speaker A: I. I have seen that you have shortlisted one property by the name of go Britannia. I LinkedIn that correct?
Speaker B: I think so.
Speaker A: I just wanted to confirm if you wish to proceed ahead with the booking or like, do you wish to explore some other options as well?
Speaker B: I haven't heard back from the university, so I don't know.
Speaker A: Okay, so you haven't heard back from the UCL accommodation, is it?
Speaker B: No.
Speaker A: So do you wish to wait until you hear back or like, do you wish to proceed ahead with another student accommodation?
Speaker B: I'll wait and contact you later.
Speaker A: So I'll do one thing here. I'll connect you next week then. I'm hoping by that time you will have the confirmation whether you got the place or like you have to book a new student accommodation. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you. Thank you.
Speaker A: Bye bye.
